definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: I brush some potato-chip crumbs off my lap.
sentences.chinese: 我把薯片屑從我大腿上擦掉。

sentences.english: For sure one more pack of chips was better, whatever small pack or large one.
sentences.chinese: 確定一個包薯片是更好的，無論小包裝或大的一個。

sentences.english: This will help prevent you from inhaling three bags of crisps and a bucket of nuts when you sidle up to the bar.
sentences.chinese: 這將幫助你避免在酒吧是喫下3袋薯片和一桶堅果。

sentences.english: Fish and Chips stall for hungry passersby 's.
sentences.chinese: 向肚餓的行人兜售魚和薯片的路邊攤。

sentences.english: For serving tea, there are fried slices of potatoes and sweet potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 作爲茶點之用的，有炸薯片或甘薯。

sentences.english: Potato chips may be fried in animal oil.
sentences.chinese: 薯片可能是用動物油炸制的。

sentences.english: The world's first advert to extra-terrestrial life is to be broadcast, a British potato chip company announced recently.
sentences.chinese: 英國一家薯片公司近日稱準備向外星人播放廣告。

sentences.english: You could even try some more unconventional dippers, like potato chips.
sentences.chinese: 你甚至可以嘗試一下一些特別的涮品，譬如薯片。

sentences.english: Being a chef, I really did it up right — brats and potato chips.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個廚師，我真的放棄權利大少爺和薯片。

sentences.english: Amin believes there is no corner of the world that can resist the temptation of a Frito-Lay potato chip.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲世界上沒有一個角落能抵制菲多利薯片的誘惑。

sentences.english: A bag of chips that looks individual may be listed as multiple servings.
sentences.chinese: 一袋貌似一人份的薯片可能會包括好幾次的食用量。

sentences.english: And everyday when you come home from work your roommate is sitting on the couch eating potato chips.
sentences.chinese: 每天你下班回家，你的室友總是窩在沙發裏喫薯片。

sentences.english: They eat tea eggs just like how Kiwis eat chips.
sentences.chinese: 他們喫茶葉蛋就像新西蘭人喫薯片一樣。

sentences.english: That's why you can't eat just one French fry.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲什麼不可能只吃一個炸薯片的原因。

sentences.english: Fruit disguised as fries carrots masquerading as crisps sodium-free salt.
sentences.chinese: 水果裝扮成薯條，胡蘿蔔僞裝成薯片，鹽不含鈉了。

definition: spicy sticks, a snack food similar to beef jerky but made with flour or dried beancurd instead of meat
